remarks: The continuity predicate when the range is given by a subbasis for a topology.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Aug-2015.)
statement:
subbascn.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
subbascn.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. V ) $.
subbascn.3 $e |- ( ph -> K = ( topGen ` ( fi ` B ) ) ) $.
subbascn.4 $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) ) $.
subbascn $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( J Cn K ) <-> ( F : X --> Y /\ A. y e. B ( `' F " y ) e. J ) ) ) $.
$d B y $.
$d F y $.
$d J y $.
$d K y $.
$d X y $.
$d Y y $.
